page.title: 03POLICE AT CARTMEL
page.content: {INTERVIEW WITH P.C. HARRINGTON, {POLICEMAN AT CARTMEL.} {Q.}Do you like working in Cartmel? {A.}Yes. I know everybody, I'm part of the community and a friend. I enjoy my work. {Q.}What area do you cover? {A.}My patch is Cartmel, Allithwaite, Flookborough, High Newton, and Newby Bridge - a population of 3250. The area includes 50 farms, 9 caravan sites,10 pubs and 3 licensed clubs. I travel an average 350 miles a week looking after my area.{ {Q.}How do you spend your day? {A.}Doing paper work in connection with farms and motorists. I visit farms, pubs and schools. Summer motorists and visitors keep me busy. {Q.}How many burglaries are there a week? {A.}An average of 2 a week.
